summary.span: 表示 对象集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和方法，可以添加和从集合中删除每个树节点。The , , and methods enable you to add and remove individual tree nodes from the collection. > [!NOTE] > 不支持枚举集合和删除节点。Enumerating the collection and removing nodes is not supported. 此外可以使用或方法来添加或从集合中移除所有树节点。You can also use the or methods to add or remove all the tree nodes from the collection. 类不能继承自类。Classes cannot inherit from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的客户信息控件。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根树节点显示客户名称和子树节点显示分配给每个客户的订单号。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此示例中，有 15 个订单显示 1,000 名客户。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 重新绘制的通过使用抑制和方法和等待显示时创建和绘制对象。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此示例要求具有`Customer`对象，可以保留一系列`Order`对象。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它还需要创建的实例对的 control 权限。It also requires that you have created an instance of a control on a . [!code-cpp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CPP/treeview.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CS/treeview.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/VB/treeview.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的方法，可添加之前创建到树节点集合的末尾的对象。This version of the method allows you to add previously created objects to the end of the tree node collection. 您还可以添加新通过使用集合的对象或方法。You can also add new objects to the collection by using the or methods. 若要删除之前添加，请使用， ，或方法。To remove a that you previously added, use the , , or methods. > [!NOTE] > 一个可以分配给一个控件一次。A can be assigned to only one control at a time. 若要添加到新的树视图控件的树节点，您必须首先将其删除其他树视图中或将其克隆。To add the tree node to a new tree view control, you must remove it from the other tree view first or clone it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的客户信息控件。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根树节点显示客户名称和子树节点显示分配给每个客户的订单号。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此示例中，有 15 个订单显示 1,000 名客户。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 重新绘制的通过使用抑制和方法和等待显示时创建和绘制对象。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此示例要求具有`Customer`对象，可以保留一系列`Order`对象。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它还需要创建的实例对的 control 权限。It also requires that you have created an instance of a control on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可确定是否是之前尝试执行操作的集合的成员。This method enables you to determine whether a is a member of the collection before attempting to perform operations on the . 可以使用此方法以确认已添加到或仍是集合的成员。You can use this method to confirm that a has been added to or is still a member of the collection. 此方法所需量是时间的节点集合的大小成正比，因此你可能想要避免使用较大的集合。The amount of time this method takes is proportional to the size of the node collection, so you may want to avoid using it with large collections. 此方法的引用相等性检查。This method checks for reference equality only. 不能用于确定集合中是否为节点的等效项不同。You cannot use it to determine whether an equivalent but different node is in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 引用相等性要求的隐含意义是，派生的不能自定义此方法的行为类型通过重写方法的类。One implication of the reference-equality requirement is that you cannot customize the behavior of this method for derived types by overriding the method of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定指定内，然后枚举集合。The following code example determines if a specified is within a , and then enumerates the collection. 此示例要求具有与具有，其中包含名为`myTreeNode2`。This example requires that you have a with a that has a that contains a named `myTreeNode2`. summary.span: 获取集合中 对象的总数。

span.span: Gets the total number of objects in the collection.

value.span: 集合中的 对象的总数。

span.span: The total number of objects in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含的数分配给集合的对象。The property holds the number of objects assigned to the collection. 可以使用属性值作为一个循环来循环访问集合的上限。You can use the property value as the upper bounds of a loop to iterate through a collection. > [!NOTE] > 集合的索引值是一个从零开始的索引，因为必须减一循环变量。Because the index value of a collection is a zero-based index, you must subtract one from the looping variable. 如果不考虑为此，您会超过上限的集合和 throw异常。If you do not account for this, you will exceed the upper bounds of the collection and throw an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的数字中的对象，将复制到集合中的内容数组，并显示列表中的树节点控件。The following code example displays the number of objects in a , copies the contents of the collection to an array, and displays a list of the tree nodes in a control. 此示例要求具有上至少有一个在其，和一个上控制。This example requires that you have a with at least one in its , and a control on a . [!code-cpp[TreeNodeCollection_Count_CopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeNodeCollection_Count_CopyTo/CPP/treenodecollection_count_copyto.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TreeNodeCollection_Count_CopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeNodeCollection_Count_CopyTo/CS/treenodecollection_count_copyto.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TreeNodeCollection_Count_CopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeNodeCollection_Count_CopyTo/VB/treenodecollection_count_copyto.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法所需量是时间的节点集合的大小成正比，因此你可能想要避免使用较大的集合。The amount of time this method takes is proportional to the size of the node collection, so you may want to avoid using it with large collections. 此方法的引用相等性检查。This method checks for reference equality only. 不能使用它来检索集合中的等效但不同节点的索引。You cannot use it to retrieve the index of an equivalent but different node in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 引用相等性要求的隐含意义是，派生的不能自定义此方法的行为类型通过重写方法的类。One implication of the reference-equality requirement is that you cannot customize the behavior of this method for derived types by overriding the method of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定指定内，然后枚举集合。The following code example determines if a specified is within a , and then enumerates the collection. 此示例要求具有与具有，其中包含名为`myTreeNode2`。This example requires that you have a with a that has a that contains a named `myTreeNode2`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果项的调用，最后一个索引将首先，检查的键的匹配项，但如果没有匹配项，则搜索开始的集合的开始处返回。If is called successively, the last returned index will be checked for a key match first, and if there is no match, the search starts at the beginning of the collection. 属性对应的键中。The property corresponds to the key for a in the . 密钥的比较不区分大小写。The key comparison is not case-sensitive. 如果`key`是`null`或空字符串，属性将返回-1。If `key` is `null` or an empty string, the property returns -1.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例中删除选定的树节点从一个并将其添加到另一个中，如果这两个树节点集合不是只读的。The following code example removes the selected tree node from one and adds it to another if both tree node collections are not read-only. 时单击时，由此属性删除从一个使用方法并添加到其他使用方法。When a is clicked, the represented by the property is deleted from one using the method and added to the other using the method. 此示例要求具有包含两个控件和一个。This example requires that you have a that contains two controls and a . 应名为控件`treeView1`和`treeView2`。The controls should be named `treeView1` and `treeView2`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当已从树节点集合，所有后续的树节点将上移集合中的一个位置。When a is removed from the tree node collection, all subsequent tree nodes are moved up one position in the collection. 您还可以删除通过使用前面添加或方法。You can also remove a that you previously added by using the or methods. > [!NOTE] > 不支持枚举集合和删除节点。Enumerating the collection and removing nodes is not supported. 若要添加新对象到集合中，使用， ，或方法。To add new objects to the collection, use the , , or methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例中删除选定的树节点从一个并将其添加到另一个中，如果这两个树节点集合不是只读的。The following code example removes the selected tree node from one and adds it to another if both tree node collections are not read-only. 时单击时，由此属性删除从一个使用方法并添加到其他使用方法。When a is clicked, the represented by the property is deleted from one using the method and added to the other using the method. 此示例要求具有包含两个控件和一个。This example requires that you have a that contains two controls and a . 应名为控件`treeView1`和`treeView2`。The controls should be named `treeView1` and `treeView2`.
